metadata.title: CVE-2017-12941 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
libunrar.a in UnRAR before 5.5.7 has an out-of-bounds read in theUnpack::Unpack20 function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunrar-headers - 1:5.5.8-1
libunrar5 - 1:5.5.8-1
unrar - 1:5.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.5.8-1').
